summary: Frontend testing of search history feature across 1.1.1 By Molecules, 1.1.2 By Post, and 1.1.3 By Position pages. All features working correctly - History buttons expand to show contacts found and recent search runs. Navigation with traffic light indicators is properly aligned to the left.
passed_tests: 1.1.1 By Molecules: Page loads with Business Units list
1.1.1 By Molecules: Status badges (Done/Running/Failed) display correctly
1.1.1 By Molecules: Last run date and days until next search shown
1.1.1 By Molecules: History button expands to show 'SEARCH HISTORY & FOUND CONTACTS'
1.1.1 By Molecules: Contacts list displays with names, job titles, LinkedIn links
1.1.1 By Molecules: Recent Runs section shows dates and results count
1.1.2 By Post: Page loads with Keywords organized by category
1.1.2 By Post: Each keyword shows Done status, date, days until next
1.1.2 By Post: Frequency selector (Monthly, Weekly, etc.) present
1.1.2 By Post: History button (clock icon) expands correctly
1.1.2 By Post: Shows contacts found or 'No contacts found yet' message
1.1.3 By Position: Page loads with Buyer Personas from WHO
1.1.3 By Position: Each persona shows colored dot, name, keywords count
1.1.3 By Position: Find DMs and History buttons present
1.1.3 By Position: History button expands to show search history
1.1.3 By Position: Shows contacts found or 'No contacts found yet' message
Navigation: Sidebar aligned to left (left: 0px)
Navigation: Traffic light indicators (colored dots) visible
Navigation: Collapsible sections work correctly
Navigation: All three pages accessible from sidebar
context_for_next_testing_agent: Search history feature is fully implemented across all three pages (1.1.1, 1.1.2, 1.1.3). The History button expands to show 'SEARCH HISTORY & FOUND CONTACTS' section with contacts list and recent runs. Navigation has traffic light indicators working. Bristol Myers Squibb in 1.1.1 shows 12 contacts found as example of working history.

features: Business Units list with status badges
History button expands to show contacts
12 contacts shown for Bristol Myers Squibb
